title: Scenes of destruction in Iran after US-Israeli strikes
partialText: Footage from Tehran shows burned vehicles, wrecked buildings, towering plumes of smoke, and a massive crater.

title: Inside Israel’s ‘normal’: Triumphalism and calm mix after attack on Iran
partialText: Israel has been on high alert since it launched a wave of joint attacks with the US against Iran.

title: Over 50 killed in strike on girls’ elementary school in Iran
partialText: Footage from Minab, Iran, shows the aftermath of an Israeli-US strike on a girls' elementary school.

title: World reacts to US, Israel attack on Iran, Tehran retaliation
partialText: EU urges 'maximum restraint'; mediator Oman warns US 'not to get sucked in' further into conflict.

title: Arsenal vs Chelsea: Premier League – preview, team news, start, lineups
partialText: League leaders Arsenal desperate for a win over Chelsea to keep resurgent Manchester City at bay.

title: Iranian deputy minister of foreign Affairs condemns US-Israeli attacks
partialText: Iran’s deputy minister of foreign affairs condemned the US-Israeli strikes.

title: Debris from intercepted Iranian missile lands in Hebron
partialText: Video shows debris from an intercepted Iranian missile that landed in Hebron in the occupied West Bank.

title: Israel strikes two schools in Iran, killing more than 50 people
partialText: State media says Israeli attack on girls' school in the city of Minab in the south of the country kills dozens.

title: India vs West Indies: T20 World Cup Super Eights – teams, start, lineups
partialText: Defending champions India will face fellow record winners West Indies for a place in the semifinals of the 2026 edition.

title: LIVE: Barcelona vs Villarreal – La Liga
partialText: Follow the build-up, analysis and live text commentary of the game as league leaders Barca host third-placed Villarreal.

title: Israeli defence system intercepts Iranian missiles over Haifa
partialText: Israeli air defence systems intercepted Iranian missiles over Haifa, as they retaliated for US-Israeli attacks on Iran.

title: Al Jazeera reporter on the streets of Tehran as missiles hit the city
partialText: Missiles fired by the US and Israel have struck multiple targets in the Iranian capital Tehran.

title: Airspace closed, airlines halt flights as US, Israel attack, Iran responds
partialText: At least eight countries, including Iran, Israel, Jordan and Qatar, shutter airspace as global air travel severely hit.

title: US, Israel bomb Iran: A timeline of talks and threats leading up to attacks
partialText: Military operations by the US and Israel in Iran mark the most intense escalation since the June 2025 conflict.

title: Kazakhstan’s train hospital brings healthcare to remote regions
partialText: 101 East joins doctors on board a medical train delivering vital healthcare to Kazakhstan’s most remote communities.

title: Multiple Arab states that host US assets targeted in Iran retaliation
partialText: Iran confirms targeting US bases across the Middle East.

title: Moment of Iran strike on US military base in Bahrain
partialText: Video shows the moment an Iranian missile struck a United States military base in Bahrain.

title: Emergency alert interrupts Al Jazeera broadcast before attack in Qatar
partialText: National emergency alerts blared during a live Al Jazeera broadcast just moments before explosions were heard in Qatar.

title: Iran strikes US military base in Bahrain as explosions heard across Gulf
partialText: Plumes of smoke rose after Iran targeted a US military base in Bahrain, following Israel–US attacks across Iran.

title: LIVE: Pakistan vs Sri Lanka – T20 World Cup Super Eights
partialText: Follow our live build-up, with toss and team news coverage, before our text commentary stream of the Group 2 game.

title: Netanyahu says US and Israel attacked Iran to remove ‘existential threat’
partialText: Israel’s PM Benjamin Netanyahu says the joint US‑Israel strikes on Iran aim to remove an ‘existential threat.'

title: Why are the US and Israel attacking Iran? What we know so far
partialText: The US and Israel bomb multiple Iranian cities, including capital Tehran. Iran hits back, launching missiles at Israel.

title: OpenAI strikes deal with Pentagon to use tech in ‘classified network’
partialText: Sam Altman claims his technology will not be used by the US for 'domestic mass surveillance' or 'autonomous weapons'.

title: Who is Iran’s Supreme Leader Khamenei and why is he a possible target?
partialText: Trump, who has previously said Khamenei should be 'very worried', is urging Iranians to overthrow their government.

title: Sweden confirms Russian drone intercepted near French aircraft carrier
partialText: Swedish forces disrupt a drone launched from a Russian ship near a visiting French aircraft carrier in Swedish waters.
